products.title: Voile FR Sage Green Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Voile FR Sage Green Roller Blind in Green. Made to measure from £9.20 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Voile FR Sage Green is a semi-translucent stylish, mint green roller and is great for freshening up the look of any room. Our Voile fabrics are a fabulous modern alternative to the traditional net curtain. A busy kitchen or living room will benefit from this delicate, translucent design in green. Flame Retardant and Pollergen-coated, makes this sheer roller blind a fantastic addition to your living space. 
  
 At Swift Direct Blinds, our customers and quality comes first, that's why we offer a five-year guarantee on our made-to-measure blinds. Based in West Yorkshire, our roller blinds are carefully cut and assembled by our expert roller team.

products.title: Stirlo Olive Green
products.metadescription: Made to Measure Stirlo Olive Green Roller Blind | Privacy, Dim-Out Fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Stirlo Olive Green Plain Roller Blind The Stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room.  The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If   the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion.

products.title: Burst Electric Lime Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Buy your new green roller blind, made to measure and with a 4-year guarantee on all blinds. Free samples available and all blinds are bespoke to your size.
products.productdescription: The green colour of the Burst Electric Lime is best suited to rooms with neutral tones so as to make the most of this colour. Ideal places for this colour blind would be in the kitchen or in a bathroom to add some colour and vibrancy to the room. As a dimout blind, this is a great fabric for filtering the light entering your room and stopping any annoying glare on your living room TV.  Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric. Just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. These blinds are moisture resistant too so can be installed in a kitchen or bathroom. Fed up of the sun spoiling your view of the telly? Install this dimout blind and stop the glare from ruinning your favourite show.  All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Vibe Lime Standard Roller Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Standard Roller Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 200mm Max Width: 3000mm (1940mm fabric turned)
 	Min Drop: 300mm Max Drop: 1690mm (3000mm fabric turned)
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Tube: Robust Aluminium Tube
 	Control: Sidewinder or Spring Control
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
